short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alegria Cebu Broadcasting Network Inc is transmitting worldwide and on FM 91.3MHz in Alegria, Cebu.
short.es: Alegria Cebu Broadcasting Network Inc está transmitiendo en todo el mundo a través de Internet y en FM 91.3MHz en Alegria, Cebu.
short.fil: Ang Alegria Cebu Broadcasting Network Inc ay nagpapadala sa buong mundo sa internet at sa FM 91.3MHz sa Alegria, Cebu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listen to the official 91.3 Ka Alegre FM audio stream directly in your browser. 

Usage: Pin the extension to the menu-bar and click the icon to turn the radio on and off. 

Enjoy news and updates from Alegria, Cebu. 

Basta 91.3 Alegre Gyud!!
long.es,fil:
Play the official 91.3 Ka Alegre FM audio stream directly in your browser. 

Please pin the extension to the menu-bar and then click our icon to turn radio listening on/off. 

Enjoy news and updates from Alegria, Cebu. 

Basta 91.3 Alegre Gyud!!
